name: Eliminator: The Encapsuled Nemesis
description:
Eliminator: The Encapsuled Nemesis is an tactical single-player shooter for everyone. Sneak to hostile fortifications, destroy your foes, capture flags, collect new weapons and fight your way through enemy lines to crush their evil plans.

Game features 10 different missions, bunch of weapons, lots of fierce enemies and tons of fun and excitement.

Expand your weapon arsenal by collecting new weapons from crashed enemies. Unlock new missions by completing previous.

In variety of missions:

Use heavy equipment, handguns and assault weapons to fight in the short distances.


Sniper rifles for the long range tactical strikes, without putting yourself into line of fire.

You can always perform best on any situation by choosing right weapons, from hammers to grenades. Plan your assault and find a way to victory.
